name: Proxmox HA Service
description: Ensures the Proxmox HA manager (pve-ha-lrm) is active and responsive.
check_cmd: if command -v pveversion >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active pve-ha-lrm 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart pve-ha-lrm 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if systemctl is-active pve-ha-lrm 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
